summary: This release brings exciting new ways to log in and create content, with passkey authentication for a smoother sign-in experience and voice transcription to help you write posts more easily. We've also made important improvements under the hood by fixing dozens of code warnings and adding new security scanning to keep everything running safely. Overall, it's a big step forward in making Grove more powerful, secure, and delightful for every writer and team.

features: unify login pages with LoginGraft across all packages (#744)
add passkey management to account page (#741)
add voice transcription to Lumen and Flow (#743)
improve pre-push with inline errors and parallel checks
add inline feedback system with spec and workshop entry
fixes: resolve failing CI and Semgrep workflows
